member.name: T:Quartz.Plugin.TimeZoneConverter.TimeZoneConverterPlugin
member.summary: This plugin provides the capability to obtain timezone information regardless of the platform and database being used.

member.name: M:Quartz.Plugin.TimeZoneConverter.TimeZoneConverterPlugin.Initialize(System.String,Quartz.IScheduler,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called during creation of the in order to give the a chance to Initialize.

member.name: M:Quartz.Plugin.TimeZoneConverter.TimeZoneConverterPlugin.Start(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called when the associated is started, in order to let the plug-in know it can now make calls into the scheduler if it needs to.

member.name: M:Quartz.Plugin.TimeZoneConverter.TimeZoneConverterPlugin.Shutdown(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called in order to inform the that it should free up all of it's resources because the scheduler is shutting down.
